R

r - Variable in class com.example.mapnector.LVAdapters.MessageAdapter.MyColor
 
refGroups - Static variable in class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseHelper
reference to Group table in firebase
refMineGroups - Variable in class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseGroupSystem
reference to array of mine groups in firebase
refMineGroupsPendingJoin - Variable in class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseGroupSystem
reference to array of groups that i should join to(request to join accepted) in firebase; most of the time empty(not existing in firebase)
refMineGroupsPendingKick - Variable in class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseGroupSystem
reference to array of groups that i should be kicked from in firebase; most of the time empty(not existing in firebase)
refMineMails - Variable in class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseMailSystem
ref to current user's mailbox in firebase
refRoot - Static variable in class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseHelper
reference to root in firebase
refUsers - Static variable in class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseHelper
reference to Users table in firebase
removeAllListeners() - Method in class com.example.mapnector.GroupManagement.LVHelper
Remove all listeners to firebases, called in case onDestroy called(because if screen rotates listeners aren't destroyed)
requestJoinGroup() - Method in class com.example.mapnector.GroupManagement.UserOptionsSystem
When user click on 'Request' button(btnJoinLeaveGroup in uiHelper) we want to send mail to the group leader that I want to join the group, without ability to change title; shows 'createCustomMailDialog' but not allows to change title(edtTitleSendMail.setEnabled(false)
resetLocation() - Method in class com.example.mapnector.MapManagement.MapManager
set my location data in firebase as 300 for both variables; requests firebase to update it
run() - Method in class com.example.mapnector.MapManagement.MapManager.LocationGetterThread
while the application MapsActivity not paused, retrieve other groupUsers location from firebase and update 'map'; then request via handler the ui thread to update markers
run() - Method in class com.example.mapnector.MapManagement.MapManager.LocationThread
while the application not paused and we allow to send locationupdate my location in database every 5 seconds; if we dont ahve permission
running - Variable in class com.example.mapnector.MapManagement.MapManager.LocationGetterThread
indicates whether the thread running or not
